changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'Alex Chimedza', 'Loice Mushayi', 'Denny Chikowo', 'Evidence Meda', 'Ozius Duri', 'Ritchard Tafira', 'Tawanda Gumiso', 'Vimbai Chihwehwete', 'Tsitsi Chitiki', 'Everisto Marowa', 'Philipa Mabunda' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" ) AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counseling");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counseling"
